sourcesContent:
import React, {useContext} from 'react'
import './Posts.css'

import {Row, Col, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'

import TemaContext from '../../../contexts/TemaContext'

const CardPost = ({postagem}) => {
    const tema = useContext(TemaContext)

    return (
        <>
            <Col className="col">                
                <Card className="p-2" bg={tema.objVariant} text={tema.objFontVariant}>
                    <Card.Img 
                        variant= "top"
                        alt="img"
                        src="https://st.depositphotos.com/1780879/3816/i/600/depositphotos_38166573-stock-photo-trees-with-sunbeams.jpg"
                    />
                    <Card.Body>
                        <Card.Title>titulo={postagem}</Card.Title>
                        <Card.Text>
                            Texto exemplo dentro do Card
                        </Card.Text>
                        <Button variant={tema.botaoVariant}>Leia Mais</Button>
                    </Card.Body>
                    <Card.Footer>
                        <small className="text-muted">
                            Última atualização 3 minutos atras
                        </small>
                    </Card.Footer>
                </Card>
            </Col>
        </>
    )
}

const Posts = () => {
    return (
        <>
            <Row xs={1} md={4} lg={3}
                className="row"
            >
                <CardPost postagem={'Postagem2'}/>
            </Row>
        </>
    )
}

export default Posts
